job.title: Data Scientist / Computer Vision  ALGORITHM RESEARCHER for our US office
job.description: Vision Elements is looking to hire an experienced&nbsp;Freelance&nbsp;Algorithm Researcher&nbsp;in the fields of computer vision / deep learning.&nbsp;American or Canadian candidates are invited to apply and join a professional and experienced group. Be part of fascinating projects and overcome exciting challenges.Our projects are diverse, in many sectors, combining teamwork with independent work.&nbsp;We are looking for an experienced and independent freelance algorithm researcher to lead our growing activity in the US. Work can take place remotely from the convenience of your home.&nbsp;Required:·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MSc / PhD / Postdoc in Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or Computer Sciences·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in computer vision / data science·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in as many of the following: 3D reconstruction algorithm development ; parameter estimation; inverse problems techniques: Graph Theory; Optimization; Deep learning; GPGPU: Medical Imaging·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Thorough skill in MATLAB / Python·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;High proficiency in C++·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Good communication skills (written and verbal)·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Independent and likes challenges&nbsp;Employment TypeFull-time   Edit job description
